title: You've Never Seen a Social Media Platform Like This Before
summary: People are leaving FB for this site in DROVES
content: It's not secret that social networks the likes of facebook and twitter are falling out of style. Young people these days are waking up to the shocking fact that giant multinational technology corporations don't have your best interest at heart. The fact of the matter is that these companies treat their users dirt. They build websites and apps that are merely glorified dopamine slot machines, designed to addict people of all stripes to using their service. And then, they turn around to sell all the demographic, psychographic, and biometric data that they can get their hands on. In fact, there are even VERY CREDIBLE reports that some of these social networks are engaging in various mind control techniques without any consent whatsoever! If you're feeling pessamistic about the future of your on-line browsing habits, then I don't blame you. But there is some good news: People are WAKING UP to all of this nefarious behavior and seeking out alternative social media outlets. One of the most popular alternatives is FriendWorld.social. In fact, people seem to be migrating to friendworld in droves! The week-over-week growth of the userbase is truly staggering, and has been SKYROCKETING as of late! So what makes friendworld so popular? For starters, the creators have commited themselves to an uncompromising degree of high-quality content. And it shows! Clicking on any thread at random is almost guaranteed to be thought-provoking, insightful, and (at times) cleverly laugh-out-loud funny! And while they do need to show a limited number of ads to keep their servers running, they at least have the good grace to avoid the same microtargetting techniques employed by more established players. Moreover, they appear to have partnered with a hand-selected third-party ad agency to ensure that all advertisements are as accurate and tasteful as possible In all, friendworld is a delightful corner of the internet, that shows everything that the web can be. It can be a place to think, a place to laugh, or a place to unwind. And most importantly, it can be a place to connect and meet a new friend :)

title: Source Confirms CIA Infiltration of 60s Counter Culture
summary: Turn on, tune in and freak out to shocking new evidence!
content:
HOLLYWOOD, CA -- Do you remember the 1960s? When free-wheeling hippies from around the US, with flowers in their hair, ALLEGEDLY descended on the Laurel Canyon to escape mainstream consumerist society? How about when they created their own community fueled by free love, rock music and experimental drug use? Think again! 
 FAKE BULLSHIT NEWS has been instrumental in corroborating new BOMBSHELL revelations from the Vault 7 WIKIleaks -- which have shattered this sunshine and rainbows view -- with reports from individuals who made it out alive. 
 The shocking Vault 7 leak [https://wikileaks.org/ciav7p1/] brings to light a program launched by the Central Intelligence Agency (CIA) where agents had been manufacturing counter culture personalities in order to infiltrate and control the youth. Microdosing and social engineering were the CIA's main instruments of control. 
 "Why is it that so many members of bands like The Byrds and The Doors had family in the inteligence community?" questions FAKE BULLSHIT NEWS's exclusive source. 
 "What we saw up in the canyon in those days was a pressure to conform. Not to the General Motors conformity, which we were against man. That was the deal of our parents' generation. But up in the canyon in those days, if you didn't go along with what they wanted, they got rid of you," FAKE BULLSHIT NEWS's exclusive source continued. 
 In fact, FAKE BULLSHIT NEWS's exclusive source is lucky she made it out alive. The Manson Murders were in fact, and this also is made evident in the Vault 7 leak, were a cover job to silence dissident elements in the manufactured counter culture. 
 These revelations have also given creedence to the long-circulated Internet conspiracy of CIA experimentation with LSD as a mind controlling substance. 
 "Wake up! There was no counter culture! It was all manufactured! It was just another way to control your mind!" FAKE BULLSHIT NEWS's source said about her experience.

title: President Trump AMBUSHED By Press
summary: The media is totally out of control!
content:
As anyone who's been reading and/or watching the news over the last couple of days is aware, journalists are off their f*cking rocker! 
 I'm refering, of course, to the HIGHLY BIASED news coverage of yesterday's press conference regarding the leakage of information regarding the alleged contact that a Trump advisor had with Russia regarding the hacking of Democratic National Convention emails. 
 I mean, come on. The NY Times called Trump, and I quote, an "Un-hinged psychopath" (https://youtu.be/3LNvXjb44-U?t=1m16s) who is a "mentally unstable MANIAC" (https://www.nytimes.com/2017/02/17/opinion/is-it-time-to-call-trump-mentally-ill.html?action=click&pgtype=Homepage&clickSource=story-heading&module=opinion-c-col-right-region&region=opinion-c-col-right-region&WT.nav=opinion-c-col-right-region). This is fake news if I've ever seen it. 
 Good thing no one trusts the NY Times any more. After all, they've been discredited time and time again, and their subscriptions are dwindling for it! 
 In actual fact, Trump gave an excellent overview of how he's been unifying the country and making TREMENDOUS progress in protectoing our country. 
 Perhaps the main reason the Press has their collective panties in a bunch is because Trump CALLED THEM OUT. The press has become so dishonest that we aren't even talking about it. Their level of dishonesty is COMPLETELY OUT OF CONTROL. All the President wants to do is protect our country, and it's becoming increasingly difficult for him to accomplish that when the Media continuously reports on unsubstantiated facts, which are clearly meant to harm the President and prevent him from protecting our country from radical terrorists who want to KILL us for our American beliefs and way of life -- and this is very difficult to do when the HIGHLY CLASSIFIED information is leaked, and so-called news organizations are broadcasting state secrets directly to terrorist leaders, whick makes in very very easy for them to plan accordingly! 
 They just don't get it. All of these articles are reporting lies. It's been showed time and time again that these stories are fake fake news, and they report it anyhow. So why jeoperdize national security for the sake of reporting falsehoods?? 
 When it comes right down to it, the media should be ashamed of themselves for reporting such blatent falsehoods. They are simply looking for attention by publishing ATTENTION grabbing headlines, which lead to clicks and ad revenue.

title: Do You Want To Miss Out On The Top Commemorative Collectable of the Decade??
content: When it comes to digital collectables, everyone knows that Non Fungible Tokens (N.F.T.s) are the wave of the future. Unless you've been living under a rock for the last year, N.F.T.s have been EVERYWHERE. Trading cards, action figures, watches, you name it! Gone are the days of hoading physical object that do nothing more than clutter up your house with junk -- they're all clearly moving in the direction of digitization. But there's one collectable that has not yet broken out into the new digital economy... until now. That's right, I'm talking about commemorative currency! Everyone remembers the booming market for commemorative coin collectables of the 2000s and 2010s -- The $50 Gold Buffalo Coin, the Word Trade Center Memorial Coin (which was struck with gold recoverd from the rubble of WTC ground zero vaults), and of course the George W. Bush Presidential Coin. Because these coins had limitetd worldwide avialability, they became harder to acquire and only increased in value. So what happens when you take this time-tested strategy and apply it to the Block Chain? You get The #1 Commemorative Collectable of the Decade! Uncirculated Fake Internet Money does exactly this, and as a result will undoubtedly be something you don't want to miss out on. Uncirculated Fake Internet Money honors the artistry of the original Fake Internet Money collection that was so popular with investors and collectors in 2021, and does so in such a way that true fans can't afford to miss out! Each Uncirculated Fake Internet Money mint represents a piece of the project's history, which makes this collection a MUST HAVE. Click here to purchase Uncirculated Fake Internet Money.
